item.title: Navigating The 'Aisle Of Confusion' To Whiten Your Teeth
item.description: August 14, 2017 - The whiter the smile the more attractive the person, research finds. Both men and women say white teeth matter when choosing a mate. This may be why whitening teeth is a $3.2 billion industry.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 14, 2017 - The whiter the smile the more attractive the person, research finds. Both men and women say white teeth matter when choosing a mate. This may be why whitening teeth is a $3.2 billion industry. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/14/542830158/navigating-the-aisle-of-confusion-to-whiten-your-teeth

item.title: Men, Listen Up: Women Like The Smell Of Guys Who Eat A Certain Diet
item.description: August 14, 2017 - Your diet can influence your appearance. You knew that. But did you know that what you eat can also impact your body odor and your attractiveness to the opposite sex?
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 14, 2017 - Your diet can influence your appearance. You knew that. But did you know that what you eat can also impact your body odor and your attractiveness to the opposite sex? http://www.npr.org/sections/thesalt/2017/08/14/540059875/men-listen-up-women-like-the-smell-of-guys-who-eat-a-certain-diet

item.title: You Can Order a Dozen STD Tests Online â€” But Should You?
item.description: August 13, 2017 - It sounds so simple: Order a kit online, test for sexually transmitted diseases in the privacy of home and mail it back. But deciding what to test for and who gets tested is far from easy.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 13, 2017 - It sounds so simple: Order a kit online, test for sexually transmitted diseases in the privacy of home and mail it back. But deciding what to test for and who gets tested is far from easy. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/13/536905120/you-can-order-a-dozen-std-tests-online-but-should-you

item.title: VIDEO: Where Mastectomy Scars Raged, A Tattoo Garden Blooms
item.description: August 12, 2017 - Nicole O'Hara was 29 when she had a double mastectomy after a cancer diagnosis. She chose to cover the scars with a tattoo that blooms like her garden, with apple blossoms, bluebells and heather.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 12, 2017 - Nicole O'Hara was 29 when she had a double mastectomy after a cancer diagnosis. She chose to cover the scars with a tattoo that blooms like her garden, with apple blossoms, bluebells and heather. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/12/537066002/video-where-mastectomy-scars-raged-a-tattoo-garden-blooms

item.title: From Alaska To Florida, States Respond To Opioid Crisis With Emergency Declarations
item.description: August 11, 2017 - President Trump announced Thursday that his administration plans to declare a national emergency to deal with the opioid epidemic. Six states have already taken this step.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 11, 2017 - President Trump announced Thursday that his administration plans to declare a national emergency to deal with the opioid epidemic. Six states have already taken this step. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/11/542836709/from-alaska-to-florida-states-respond-to-opioid-crisis-with-emergency-declaratio

item.title: Europe's Egg-Contamination Scandal Spreads As Far As Hong Kong
item.description: August 11, 2017 - Tainted eggs have been found in at least 16 countries in Europe. Millions of eggs have been pulled from European shelves over fears they are contaminated with fipronil, which is used to kill insects.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 11, 2017 - Tainted eggs have been found in at least 16 countries in Europe. Millions of eggs have been pulled from European shelves over fears they are contaminated with fipronil, which is used to kill insects. http://www.npr.org/2017/08/11/542781029/europes-egg-contamination-scandal-spreads-as-far-as-hong-kong

item.title: Netflix, ABC Portrayals Of Autism Still Fall Short, Critics Say
item.description: August 11, 2017 - Two new TV series feature main characters who have autism. While some are applauding the fresh take on the disorder, others worry that the shows send the wrong messages.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 11, 2017 - Two new TV series feature main characters who have autism. While some are applauding the fresh take on the disorder, others worry that the shows send the wrong messages. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/11/542668400/netflix-abc-portrayals-of-autism-still-fall-short-critics-say

item.title: What Could Happen If Trump Formally Declares Opioids A National Emergency
item.description: August 11, 2017 - The president has already called the opioid crisis an emergency. If he makes it official through a formal declaration, more money and personnel could be available to deal with the epidemic.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 11, 2017 - The president has already called the opioid crisis an emergency. If he makes it official through a formal declaration, more money and personnel could be available to deal with the epidemic. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/11/542767898/president-trump-to-declare-national-opioid-emergency

item.title: News Brief: Trump Speaks Out About North Korea, Opioid Crisis
item.description: August 11, 2017 - President Trump says his promise to meet Pyongyang's threats with "fire and fury" might have been too soft. And, he says he's ready to declare the nation's opioid crisis "a national emergency."
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 11, 2017 - President Trump says his promise to meet Pyongyang's threats with "fire and fury" might have been too soft. And, he says he's ready to declare the nation's opioid crisis "a national emergency." http://www.npr.org/2017/08/11/542752972/morning-news-brief-trump-speaks-out-about-north-korea-opioid-crisis

item.title: Nearly 1 In 5 Hospice Patients Discharged While Still Alive
item.description: August 11, 2017 - The hospices that discharge the most patients before their death also make the most money, a recent study shows.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 11, 2017 - The hospices that discharge the most patients before their death also make the most money, a recent study shows. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/11/542607941/nearly-1-in-5-hospice-patients-discharged-while-still-alive

item.title: Drinking On The Rise In U.S., Especially For Women, Minorities, Older Adults
item.description: August 10, 2017 - A new study in JAMA Psychiatry looks at rates of alcohol use from 2002 to 2013. Alcohol use in general went up, and problem drinking â€” binging, abuse and dependence â€” increased even more.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 10, 2017 - A new study in JAMA Psychiatry looks at rates of alcohol use from 2002 to 2013. Alcohol use in general went up, and problem drinking â€” binging, abuse and dependence â€” increased even more. http://www.npr.org/sections/thetwo-way/2017/08/10/542409957/drinking-on-the-rise-in-u-s-especially-for-women-minorities-older-adults

item.title: People Back Editing Genes To Treat Disease, But Are Wary Of Inheritable Changes
item.description: August 10, 2017 - Scientists are getting closer to being able to alter people's genes permanently. A survey found that people are more cautious about changes that could be passed on to future generations.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 10, 2017 - Scientists are getting closer to being able to alter people's genes permanently. A survey found that people are more cautious about changes that could be passed on to future generations. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/10/542659066/people-back-editing-genes-to-treat-disease-but-are-wary-of-inheritable-changes

item.title: A 'Vaccine For Addiction' Is No Simple Fix
item.description: August 10, 2017 - Scientists are trying to develop a vaccine to block the euphoria of heroin without interfering with other pain relief. The Trump administration hopes the approach might help with the opioid epidemic.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 10, 2017 - Scientists are trying to develop a vaccine to block the euphoria of heroin without interfering with other pain relief. The Trump administration hopes the approach might help with the opioid epidemic. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/10/542605039/a-vaccine-for-addiction-is-no-simple-fix

item.title: Trump Says He Intends To Declare Opioid Crisis National Emergency
item.description: August 10, 2017 - The comments follow a recommendation of a national commission, citing deaths of 142 people in the U.S. a day. The administration initially said it would not follow through on the recommendation.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 10, 2017 - The comments follow a recommendation of a national commission, citing deaths of 142 people in the U.S. a day. The administration initially said it would not follow through on the recommendation. http://www.npr.org/2017/08/10/542669730/trump-says-he-intends-to-declare-opioid-crisis-national-emergency

item.title: Democrats Fear Medicare-For-All Plan Could Sharpen Party Divisions
item.description: August 10, 2017 - Sen. Bernie Sanders is promoting a Medicare-for-all health care plan, and some Democrats are worried it could sharpen divisions in the party.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 10, 2017 - Sen. Bernie Sanders is promoting a Medicare-for-all health care plan, and some Democrats are worried it could sharpen divisions in the party. http://www.npr.org/2017/08/10/542663685/democrats-fear-medicare-for-all-plan-could-sharpen-party-divisions
